sf284:2: saṁti śramaṇa eke śramaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ ye svayaṁkṛtaṁ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti | saṁty eke parakṛtaṁ prajñapayaṁti saṁty eke svayaṁkṛtaṁ ca parakṛtaṁ ca | saṁty eke ’svayaṁkāra?aparakārahetusamutpannaṁ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti | yathā kathaṁ samutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti |
sf284:4: yathā kathaṁ śramaṇa anyathāsamutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti |
sf284:6: yathā kathaṁ śramaṇa pratītyasamutpannaṁ arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñpayaṁti |
sf284:7: tena hi bhagini tvām eva prakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamati tathaitaṁ vyākuru |
sf284:8: kiṁ manyase bhagini | asti cakṣuḥ | asti śramaṇa | asti rūpam | asti śramaṇa |
sf284:9: cakṣuś ced bhagini utpadyeta api nu asti cakṣuḥsaṁsparśapratyayam ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā | asti śramaṇa |
sf284:10: asti śrotram asti ghāṇam asti jihvā asti kāyaḥ asti manaḥ |
sf284:12: asti śrotraṁ ghrāṇaṁ jihvā kāyo manaś ced utpadyeta api nu śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṁsparśapratyayam ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā |
sf284:14: evaṁ hi bhagini pratīyasamutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti |
sf284:15: evaṁ hi śramaṇa pratītyasamutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaṁ prajñapya yathā kathaṁ śramaṇa arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhasya nirodhaṁ prajñapayaṁti |
sf284:16: tena hi bhagini tvām eva prakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamati tathaitaṁ vyākuru |
sf284:17: kiṁ manyase bhagini | cakṣuś ced bhagini sarveṇa sarvaṁ sarvathā apariśeṣaṁ nirudhyeta apariśeṣan adhyastaṁ parikṣayam paryādānaṁ gacched api nu cakṣuḥsaṁsparśapratyayam ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā |
sf284:19: śrotraṁ ghrāṇaṁ jihvā kāyo manaś ced bhagini sarveṇa sarvaṁ sarvathā apariśeṣaṁ nirudhyeta apariśeṣam adhyastaṁ parikṣayaṁ paryādānaṁ gacchet api nu manaḥsaṁsparśapratyayam ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā |
sf284:21: evaṁ hi bhagini ārhantaḥ pratītyasamutpannasya sukhaduḥkhasya nirodhaṁ prajñapayaṁti |
sf284:22: asmiṁ khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāne veṇukātyāyanasagotryā virajo vigatamalaṁ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam …
sf284:23: atha veṇukātyāyanasagotrī dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṁkṣā tīrṇavicikitsā aparapratyayā ananyaneyā śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśaradyaprāptā utthāyāsanād ekāṁsam uttarāsaṁgaṁ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān udāyī tenāṁjaliṁ praṇamya āyuṣmantam udāyinam idam avocat |
sf284:24: abhikrāntāhaṁ śramaṇa abhikrāntā eṣāhaṁ bhagavantaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi dharmaṁ ca bhikṣusaṁghaṁ ca | upāsikāṁ ca mān dhāraya śramaṇa adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇopetaṁ śaraṇaṁgatām abhiprasannām |
sf284:25: atha udāyī veṇukātyāyanasagotrīṁ brāhmaṇīṁ dhārmyā kathayāsaṁdarśayitvā samādapayitvā samuttejayitvā saṁpraharṣayitvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
